topic.title: Exercise: rapp005 - Sales per box per order per period

section.p: Create a copy of report Sales per box per order per period and name the copy rapp005. Change the design of the report so that the total amount per box is printed next to the name box.

ol.li: Copy and paste report Sales per box per order per period and name it rapp005.
Open report rapp005 in Design View.
Move the boxes with sum for quantity and sales to the section groupheader, to the right of the BoxName .
